title: Google\Cloud\ResourceManager\V3\SearchOrganizationsRequest
name: SearchOrganizationsRequest
description:
The request sent to the SearchOrganizations method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.resourcemanager.v3.SearchOrganizationsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: Optional. The maximum number of organizations to return in the response. If unspecified, server picks an appropriate default.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: Optional. A pagination token returned from a previous call to SearchOrganizations that indicates from where listing should continue.

params.name: data.query
params.description: Optional. An optional query string used to filter the Organizations to return in the response. Query rules are case-insensitive. | Field | Description | |------------------|--------------------------------------------| | directoryCustomerId, owner.directoryCustomerId | Filters by directory customer id. | | domain | Filters by domain. | Organizations may be queried by directoryCustomerId or by domain, where the domain is a G Suite domain, for example: Query directorycustomerid:123456789 returns Organization resources with owner.directory_customer_id equal to 123456789. Query domain:google.com returns Organization resources corresponding to the domain google.com.

params.name: var

methods.name: getQuery
methods.description:
Optional. An optional query string used to filter the Organizations to return in the response. Query rules are case-insensitive.

Field Description
directoryCustomerId, owner.directoryCustomerId Filters by directory
customer id.
domain Filters by domain.

Organizations may be queried by directoryCustomerId or by domain, where the domain is a G Suite domain, for example:

  • Query directorycustomerid:123456789 returns Organization resources with owner.directory_customer_id equal to 123456789.
  • Query domain:google.com returns Organization resources corresponding to the domain google.com.

Generated from protobuf field string query = 3 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OPTIONAL];
